name: BLUE TEAM FLIGHT SCHOOL, S.L.
about: Blue Team Flight School, S.L., founded in 2020 by pilots, instructors, and aviation enthusiasts, is the only Approved Training Organisation (ATO) in the Canary Islands operating permanently at international airports. With bases at Tenerife South and Tenerife North airports, we offer training in a challenging environment similar to what future pilots will encounter in their careers. Our highly qualified instructors and state-of-the-art facilities, including certified FNPT II simulators, ensure high-quality theoretical and practical training. We prioritize a personalized teaching structure with small class sizes to enhance the learning experience. Located in the Canary Islands, our students benefit from stable and favorable weather conditions year-round, accelerating their learning process. At Blue Team, we are committed to building team spirit and preparing our students for successful careers in aviation. Join us to achieve your dream of becoming a pilot.
